prod_desc: Explore the secrets of the sea with Ariel and Flounder.
prod_long_desc:
Slide back the glass door and step inside Disney Princess™ Ariel’s Cave. Swim over to Ursula’s grotto and place Ariel at the revolving stand to reveal her human legs. This set is easy to build and perfect for fans of Disney’s The Little Mermaid to reenact their favorite scenes or create new stories of their own. Includes 2 mini-doll figures plus a Flounder figure.
Build the LEGO Disney Ariel’s cave featuring a sliding door, a treasure chest, and even a hideout for Flounder!
Featured in the critically acclaimed Walt Disney Studio’s classic: The Little Mermaid
Includes Ariel with switchable mermaid tail or legs and Ursula mini-doll figures
LEGO Disney Princess building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Ariel’s cave measures 5” high, 5” wide and 3” long. Ursula’s grotto measures 3” high, 3” wide and 3” long.
222 pieces – For girls and boys between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
